title.narrative: Improving understanding of the risks for investors and implications for policymakers of stranded coal-fired power assets in China

description.narrative: The project is designed to: (i) improve the understanding of financial institutions and regulators in China (such as the People's Bank of China and the China Banking Regulatory Commission) so they better understand the risks of stranded coal-fired generation assets and their precise exposure, so that they can shift capital away from such investments and take steps to manage the build-up of stranded asset risk in China's financial system; and (ii) support China's central government (e.g. the National Energy Administration and the National Development and Reform Commission) and the Jilin Provincial Government to better manage the political challenges, especially those in the electricity sector, associated with asset stranding and to formulate policies that can ensure a smoother transition away from coal-fired generation.
